sentences.sContent: the treachery of those who plotted against the king
sentences.sCn: 密谋反对国王者的不忠行为

remMethod.val: treach(=trick诡计)+ery → 在背后耍诡计 → 背叛

words.tran: 奸诈的，叛逆的，背叛的；危险的；不牢靠的
背叛地；危险地；靠不住地

trans.tranOther: behaviour in which someone is not loyal to a person who trusts them, especially when this behaviour helps that person’s enemies
